name: Onion Rush
description:
/!\ This is a local multiplayer Game /!\

You have to chop the required amount of onions before your opponent.
Use your knives to pick and then chop-chop the onions.

The more onions you slice, the more blurry is your vision.
Some special onions can give you a bonus if you cut them or your bench or a malus for your opponent if you cut it on his bench.

Controls :

Left Joystick : Move your left hand.
Right Joystick : Move your right hand.
LB/RB : Chop Onions

Requires 2 x360 controllers.
